content:
# Recruitment for the Erasmus + program for the 2025/2026 academic year has begun-- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail?tx_news_pi1%5Baction%5D=detail&tx_news_pi1%5Bcontroller%5D=News&tx_news_pi1%5Bnews%5D=1217&cHash=8db2d0773cade0fddaa147c619b1aee2
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:57

Recruitment for the Erasmus + program for the 2025/2026 academic year has begun 

 17-03-2025 

 Submission of application documents for study trips continues until April 11, 2025. 

Detailed information is available on the 
ERASMUS+
 website.

Back
